db:abstract.db:para: The QMediaServiceCameraInfoInterface class interface provides camera-specific information about devices supported by a camera service plug-in.
This struct was introduced in Qt 5.3.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QMediaServiceProviderPlugin may implement this interface, in that case it also needs to implement the QMediaServiceSupportedDevicesInterface.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QMediaServiceCameraInfoInterface::~QMediaServiceCameraInfoInterface()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a media service camera info interface.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QMediaServiceCameraInfoInterface::cameraOrientation(const QByteArray &device) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the physical orientation of a camera device supported by a camera service plug-in.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QCamera::Position QMediaServiceCameraInfoInterface::cameraPosition(const QByteArray &device) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the physical position of a camera device supported by a camera service plug-in.
